string.english: Press M to mute in game
string.translation: Prem M per a silenciar el joc

string.english: Press N to mute music only
string.translation: Prem N per a silenciar només la música
Ajusta la configuració de la pantalla.
Ajusta la configuració del volum|i de la banda sonora.

string.explanation: menu option, game save that was made at a teleporter
title, game save that was made at a teleporter
menu option, game save that was made freely from the menu (at any checkpoint)
title, game save that was made freely from the menu (at any checkpoint)

string.translation: ERROR: No s’ha trobat cap nivell.

string.english: ERROR: This level has no start point!
string.translation: ERROR: Aquest nivell no té|cap punt d’inici!

string.english: Unlock parts of the game normally unlocked as you progress.
string.translation: Desbloca parts del joc que normalment es desbloquen en progressar.

string.english: From here, you may unlock parts of the game that are normally unlocked as you play.
string.translation: Aquí pots desblocar parts del joc|que normalment es desbloquen|en progressar.

string.english: Rebind your controller's buttons and adjust sensitivity.
string.translation: Reassigna els botons del controlador|i ajusta’n la sensibilitat.

string.english: Delete your main game save data and unlocked play modes.
string.translation: Suprimeix les dades desades|de la partida principal|i els modes de joc desblocats.

string.english: Delete your custom level save data and completion stars.
string.translation: Suprimeix les dades desades|dels nivells personalitzats|i les estrelles de compleció.
string.explanation: completion stars: when completing a level you get either 1 or 2 stars

string.english: Are you sure? This will delete your current saves...
string.translation: Segur? Se suprimiran les partides desades actuals...

string.english: Are you sure you want to delete all your saved data?
string.translation: Segur que vols suprimir|totes les dades desades?

string.english: Are you sure you want to delete your quicksave?
string.translation: Segur que vols suprimir la partida|desada amb el desat ràpid?
string.explanation: only the quicksave of a custom level

string.translation: Canvia entre el mode finestra|i el mode pantalla completa
Canvia el mode de redimensionament entre contingut/estirat/enter.
string.explanation: See the `Current mode` explanations for more details on the modes
integer (whole number) mode only enlarges the game in exact multiples of 320x240
stretch mode just stretches the game to fill the window content
letterbox mode enlarges the game to the window, but adds black bars to make the aspect ratio 4:3
menu option. The game will be resized to the closest multiple of the normal resolution, 320x240, so for example if your window is 682x493, it will resize to 640x480
title. The game will be resized to the closest multiple of the normal resolution, 320x240, so for example if your window is 682x493, it will resize to 640x480

string.english: Resize to the nearest window size that is of an integer multiple.
string.translation: Redimensiona a la mida de finestra més propera que sigui un múltiple enter.
string.explanation: The game will be resized to the closest multiple of the normal resolution, 320x240, so for example if your window is 682x493, it will resize to 640x480

string.english: You must be in windowed mode to use this option.
string.translation: Cal que facis servir el mode finestra per a activar aquesta opció.
string.explanation: The game cannot be in fullscreen to resize the window
menu option, analogue mode simulates distortion from bad signal
title, analogue mode simulates distortion from bad signal

string.english: There is nothing wrong with your television set. Do not attempt to adjust the picture.
string.translation: Al teu televisor no li passa res.|No provis d’ajustar-ne la imatge.

string.explanation: menu option, kind of a misnomer, toggle between 30 FPS and more than 30 FPS

string.english: Change whether the game runs at 30 or over 30 FPS.
string.translation: Canvia si el joc funciona|a 30 o a més de 30 FPS.

string.english: Change the volume of the music.
string.translation: Canvia el volum de la música.

string.english: Change the volume of sound effects.
string.translation: Canvia el volum dels efectes de so.

string.explanation: credits, people who donated a certain amount before the game originally released

string.english: VVVVVV is supported by the following patrons
string.translation: Els següents mecenes|han donat suport a VVVVVV
i també hi han donat suport
string.explanation: credits, VVVVVV is also supported by the following people
credits. This list of names, AND furthermore, this other list of names
credits. This doesn't _really_ need `GitHub` specifically, it could be replaced with `Code`
credits, and thanks also to ... you!
credits, and thanks also to ... you!

string.english: Your support makes it possible for me to continue making the games I want to make, now and into the future.
string.translation: El teu suport fa possible que pugui continuar creant els jocs que vull crear, ara i en un futur!

string.english: You cannot save in this mode.
string.translation: En aquest mode no es pot desar.

string.english: Would you like to disable the cutscenes during the game?
string.translation: Vols desactivar les escenes|durant la partida?

string.explanation: analog stick sensitivity, game pad menu
analog stick sensitivity, game pad menu
analog stick sensitivity, game pad menu
menu option. In-game death key to restart at checkpoint
controller binds, bound to A, B, X, Y, etc. These strings end with a space!
controller binds, bound to A, B, X, Y, etc. These strings end with a space!
controller binds, bound to A, B, X, Y, etc. These strings end with a space!
in-game death key to restart at checkpoint. Controller binds, bound to A, B, X, Y, etc. These strings end with a space!
controller binds, bound to A, B, X, Y, etc. These strings end with a space!

string.translation: ERROR: No s’ha trobat cap fitxer de llengua.

string.explanation: Language folder from the Git repository

string.english: Some options that are useful for translators and developers.
string.translation: Diverses opcions que són útils|per als traductors i desenvolupadors.

string.explanation: menu option, menu that allows you to apply maintenance to translations
menu option. Button that opens the folder with language files (which is called lang) in a file explorer

string.english: Sync all language files after adding new strings.
string.translation: Sincronitza tots els fitxers|de llengua després d’afegir|cadenes noves.

string.english: Enable room name translation mode, so you can translate room names in context. Press I for invincibility.
string.translation: Activa el mode de traducció de noms|de sales perquè puguis traduir-los|amb context. Prem I per a obtenir invencibilitat.

string.english: You have not enabled room name translation mode!
string.translation: No has activat el mode de traducció|de noms de sales!

string.english: Cycle through most menus in the game. The menus will not actually work, all options take you to the next menu instead. Press Escape to stop.
string.translation: Passeja per la majoria de menús|del joc. Els menús no funcionaran|i totes les opcions et duran al menú següent. Prem Esc per a aturar-ho.

string.english: Display all text boxes from cutscenes.xml. Only tests the basic appearance of each individual text box.
string.translation: Mostra totes les capses de text|de cutscenes.xml. Només mostra l’aparença bàsica de cada capsa|de text.

string.explanation: menu option, paste script name from clipboard

string.english: Explore the rooms of any level in the game, to find all room names to translate.
string.translation: Explora les sales de qualsevol nivell del joc per a trobar tots els noms|de sales i traduir-los.

string.english: Find translations that don't fit within their defined bounds.
string.translation: Troba traduccions que no encaixen|amb els límits definits.
No s’ha trobat cap desbordament|de text!
string.explanation: limits check. no strings go outside their max bounds

string.translation: No hi ha cap més desbordament de text!
string.explanation: limits check. we have seen all strings that go outside their max bounds

string.english: Note that this detection isn't perfect.
string.translation: Tingues en compte que la detecció|no és perfecta.

string.english: Merge all new strings from the template files into the translation files, keeping existing translations.
string.translation: Fusiona totes les cadenes noves|dels fitxers de plantilla als fitxers|de les traduccions, tot mantenint|les traduccions actuals.

string.english: Count the amount of untranslated strings for this language.
string.translation: Compta la quantitat de cadenes|sense traduir d’aquesta llengua.

string.english: Count the amount of untranslated strings for each language.
string.translation: Compta la quantitat de cadenes|sense traduir de cada llengua.

string.english: If new strings were added to the English template language files, this feature will insert them in the translation files for all languages. Make a backup, just in case.
string.translation: Si s’han afegit cadenes noves|als fitxers de plantilla de llengua|en anglès, aquesta opció les inserirà als fitxers de traducció de totes|les llengües. Fes-ne una còpia|de seguretat, per si de cas.

string.explanation: translation maintenance menu. The following list of language files can be fully synced from English to all other languages by pressing this button - new strings will be inserted in all languages
translation maintenance menu. The following list of language files are untouched by the sync button
menu option. Turns the pause screen on/off, which shows up when the window is unfocused/inactive (only one window is normally in focus/active at a time). Possible alternative: auto pause screen
title. Turns the pause screen on/off, which shows up when the window is unfocused/inactive (only one window is normally in focus/active at a time). Possible alternative: auto pause screen

string.english: Toggle if the game will pause when the window is unfocused.
string.translation: Commuta si el joc es pausarà|quan la finestra perdi el focus.
Pausa en perdre el focus DESACTIVADA
string.explanation: Making another window active will not show the pause screen.

string.translation: Pausa en perdre el focus ACTIVADA
string.explanation: Making another window active will show the pause screen.

string.translation: pausa l’àudio en perdre el focus
string.explanation: menu option. Allows the user to choose whether the music should pause, or continue to play, when the window is unfocused/inactive (only one window is normally in focus/active at a time). Possible alternative: auto audio pause

title. Allows the user to choose whether the music should pause, or continue to play, when the window is unfocused/inactive (only one window is normally in focus/active at a time). Possible alternative: auto audio pause

string.english: Toggle if the audio will pause when the window is unfocused.
string.translation: Commuta si l’àudio es pausarà|quan la finestra perdi el focus.
Pausa d’àudio en perdre|el focus DESACTIVADA
string.explanation: Making another window active will leave the music keep playing.

string.translation: Pausa d’àudio en perdre|el focus ACTIVADA
string.explanation: Making another window active will pause the music.

string.english: Toggle the in-game timer outside of time trials.
string.translation: Mostra o amaga el temporitzador|dins del joc fora del mode contrarellotge.

string.explanation: title, lets the user change the key for interacting with objects or crewmates

string.english: Toggle whether you interact with prompts using ENTER or E.
string.translation: Commuta si s’interacciona|fent servir Retorn o E.
string.explanation: prompts: see the `Press {button} to talk to .../activate terminal/teleport` below
keyboard key E. Speedrunner options menu
keyboard key ENTER. Speedrunner options menu
the ACTION key is either the SPACE key, Z or V (this is explained on the title screen). It's used in strings like `Press ACTION to advance text`
keyboard key (E or ENTER) is filled in for {button}. Speedrunner options menu
title, allows the loading screen which counts to 100% to be turned off

string.english: Disable the fake loading screen which appears on game launch.
string.translation: Desactiva la pantalla falsa de càrrega que apareix quan es llança el joc.

string.explanation: allows the loading screen which counts to 100% to be turned off
allows the loading screen which counts to 100% to be turned off
menu option, background behind room names

string.english: Lets you see through what is behind the name at the bottom of the screen.
string.translation: Permet veure què hi ha darrere del nom a la part inferior de la pantalla.
El fons del nom de sala és TRANSLÚCID
El fons del nom de sala és OPAC

string.english: Access some advanced settings that might be of interest to speedrunners.
string.translation: Accedeix a opcions avançades que poden ser d’interès per als speedrunners.

string.explanation: menu option, a glitchrunner is a speedrunner who takes advantage of glitches to run through the game faster
title, a glitchrunner is a speedrunner who takes advantage of glitches to run through the game faster

string.english: Re-enable glitches that existed in previous versions of the game.
string.translation: Reactiva errors que existien|en versions anteriors del joc.

string.explanation: a version number is filled in for {version}, such as 2.0 or 2.2

string.english: Select a new glitchrunner version below.

string.explanation: menu option, do not emulate any older version
VVVVVV version number for glitchrunner mode
VVVVVV version number for glitchrunner mode
menu option, enable 1 frame of delay after pressing input
title, enable 1 frame of delay after pressing input

string.english: Re-enable the 1-frame input delay from previous versions of the game.
string.translation: Reactiva el retard en l’entrada|d’un fotograma que hi havia|en versions anteriors del joc.
El retard en l’entrada està ACTIVAT
El retard en l’entrada està DESACTIVAT

string.english: Disable screen effects, enable slowdown modes or invincibility.
string.translation: Desactiva efectes de pantalla, activa modes alentits o la invencibilitat.

string.english: Disable animated backgrounds in menus and during gameplay.
string.translation: Desactiva els fons animats als menús|i durant la partida.
Desactiva els flaixos i la vibració|de la pantalla.
Desactiva la vora del text del joc.
La vora del text està ACTIVADA.
La vora del text està DESACTIVADA.

string.english: Explore the game freely without dying. (Can cause glitches.)
string.translation: Explora el joc lliurement sense morir. (Pot causar errors.)

string.english: Are you sure you want to enable invincibility?
Select a new game speed below.

string.translation: La velocitat del joc és normal.
La velocitat del joc és al 80%
La velocitat del joc és al 60%
La velocitat del joc és al 40%

string.english: Who do you want to play the level with?
string.translation: Amb qui vols jugar a aquest nivell?

string.english: Replay any level in the game in a competitive time trial mode.
string.translation: Torna a jugar a qualsevol nivell|del joc en un mode contrarellotge competitiu.

string.english: Time Trials are not available with slowdown or invincibility.
string.translation: El mode contrarellotge no està disponible amb alentiment|o invencibilitat.

string.english: You can unlock each time trial separately.

string.translation: Torna a jugar als nivells d’entreacte.

string.english: TO UNLOCK: Complete the intermission levels in-game.
string.translation: PER A DESBLOCAR-LOS: Completa els nivells d’entreacte durant la partida.

string.english: Play the entire game without dying once.
string.translation: Juga al joc sencer sense morir|ni una sola vegada.

string.english: No Death Mode is not available with slowdown or invincibility.
string.translation: El mode sense cap mort no està disponible amb alentiment|o invencibilitat.
desbloca el mode sense cap mort

string.english: TO UNLOCK: Achieve an S-rank or above in at least 4 time trials.
string.translation: PER A DESBLOCAR-LO:|Aconsegueix un rang S o superior|en almenys 4 contrarellotges.
string.explanation: ranks are B A S V, see below
menu option, mirrors the entire game vertically
title, mirrors the entire game vertically

string.english: Flip the entire game vertically. Compatible with other game modes.
string.translation: Inverteix el joc sencer verticalment. És compatible amb altres modes de joc.
PER A DESBLOCAR-LO: Passa’t el joc.

string.english: Are you sure you want to quit?

string.explanation: you managed to reach the following room
player died before managing to save anybody
player died after saving one crewmate
player died after saving two crewmates
player died after saving three crewmates
player died after saving four crewmates

string.english: Er, how did you do that?
string.translation: Eh... Com ho has fet, això?
string.explanation: player died even though they were finished, lol

string.english: A new trophy has been awarded and placed in the secret lab to acknowledge your achievement!
string.translation: T’hem premiat amb un nou trofeu|i l’hem posat al laboratori secret|en reconeixement de la teva fita!

string.explanation: time the player took playing the level
amount of times the player died
inserted between two times, ex: 0:46.90 / 1:15.99. Time trial results
ex: One out of Twenty, see numbers.xml. You can add |upper for an uppercase letter.
trinket count in telesave/quicksave information box. You can add |upper for an uppercase letter.
trinket count on Game Complete screen (after Trinkets Found:) You can add |upper for an uppercase letter.
time trial rank was upgraded (B → A → S → V). B is minimum, which is purposefully high (see it as 7/10) - S is a popular rank above A in a lot of games, so VVVVVV added a rank above that.
followed by `Rescue XX`/`Complete the game`, and then `Find XX trinkets`
followed by a list of personal bests for TIME, SHINY and LIVES. So `records` as in `world records`, except for yourself
followed by the goal time for this time trial
in time trial. Stopwatch time, not too long
in time trial. Number of times player died, not too long
in time trial. Number of shiny trinkets collected, not too long
in time trial. Goal time for time trial
ranks are B A S V

string.english: Your save files have been updated.
If you want to keep exploring the game, select CONTINUE from the play menu.
string.translation: Si vols continuar explorant el joc, selecciona CONTINUA al menú del joc.

string.english: You have unlocked a new Time Trial.
You have unlocked some new Time Trials.
You have unlocked No Death Mode.
string.translation: Has desblocat el mode sense cap mort.

string.english: You have unlocked the intermission levels.

string.explanation: menu option. Button that opens the folder with level files in a file explorer
menu option. Path to the levels folder
button, which is a menu option, so lowercase
menu option, silence error message - do not show this message again

string.english: To install new player levels, copy the .vvvvvv files to the levels folder.
string.translation: Per a instal·lar nous nivells,|copia els fitxers .vvvvvv|a la carpeta de nivells.

string.english: Are you sure you want to show the levels path? This may reveal sensitive information if you are streaming.
string.translation: Segur que vols mostrar el camí|de la carpeta de nivells?|Si estàs emetent en directe, pot ser|que es mostri informació delicada.
[Prem Retorn per a tornar a l’editor]
- Prem Acció per a avançar el text -

string.explanation: map screen. So like a TV/computer monitor

string.english: Press ACTION to warp to the ship.
string.translation: Prem Acció per a teletransportar-te|a la nau

string.english: Press {button} to warp to the ship.

string.explanation: this male crew member is missing
this female crew member is missing
Viridian is missing (final level). You could even fill in something like `Uh-oh...` here if you really have to specify gender otherwise - everyone else is rescued, but the player is missing
this male crew member is not missing anymore
this female crew member is not missing anymore

string.translation: No es pot desar a la repetició|d’un nivell

string.english: Cannot Save in No Death Mode
string.translation: No es pot desar al mode sense cap mort
No es pot desar al laboratori secret
ERROR: No s’ha pogut desar la partida!

string.english: ERROR: Could not save settings file!
string.translation: ERROR: No s’ha pogut desar|el fitxer de configuració!
[Prem Acció per a desar la partida]

string.english: (Note: The game is autosaved at every teleporter.)
string.translation: (Nota: La partida es desa automàticament a cada teletransportador.)

string.english: Do you want to quit? You will lose any unsaved progress.
string.translation: Vols sortir? Perdràs el progrés|que no hagis desat.

string.english: Do you want to return to the secret laboratory?
Press Left/Right to choose a Teleporter
string.explanation: tight fit, so maybe `Left/Right: choose teleporter`, or use ←/→

keyboard key (E or ENTER) or controller button glyph is filled in for {button}

level editor. Repetition of the player's path after playtesting is disabled
level editor. Repetition of the player's path after playtesting is enabled
title, editor, font that a custom level will show up in. You can select a language name here (like Chinese or Japanese which have different fonts, or `other`)

string.explanation: level options, followed by name of font (mind the space)

editor, followed by the number and name of a song, or `No background music`. Can be changed with scripting later, so this is really just initial music

string.translation: CAPSA DE SCRIPT:|Fes clic a la part superior esquerra

string.english: SCRIPT BOX: Click on the first corner

string.translation: CAPSA DE SCRIPT:|Fes clic a la part inferior dreta

string.english: SCRIPT BOX: Click on the last corner
string.explanation: editor, a script box is an invisible box that runs a script when touched

string.translation: LÍMITS D’ENEMIC:|Fes clic a la part superior esquerra

string.english: ENEMY BOUNDS: Click on the first corner
string.explanation: editor, invisible box which enemies always stay inside of

string.translation: LÍMITS D’ENEMIC:|Fes clic a la part inferior dreta

string.english: ENEMY BOUNDS: Click on the last corner
string.explanation: editor, invisible box which enemies always stay inside of

string.english: PLATFORM BOUNDS: Click on top left
string.translation: LÍMITS DE PLATAFORMA:|Fes clic a la part superior esquerra

string.english: PLATFORM BOUNDS: Click on the first corner
string.explanation: editor, invisible box which moving platforms always stay inside of

string.english: PLATFORM BOUNDS: Click on bottom right
string.translation: LÍMITS DE PLATAFORMA:|Fes clic a la part inferior dreta

string.english: PLATFORM BOUNDS: Click on the last corner

string.translation: Fes clic a la part superior esquerra
Fes clic a la part inferior dreta

string.explanation: supposed to look like a Commodore 64 screen

string.english: PRESS ESC TO RETURN TO MENU
string.translation: PREM ESC PER A TORNAR AL MENÚ
string.explanation: Commodore 64-style script editor, TO MENU is redundant

string.translation: NO S’HA TROBAT CAP ID DE SCRIPT
string.explanation: Commodore 64-style script editor, basically NO SCRIPTS FOUND

string.english: CREATE A SCRIPT WITH EITHER THE TERMINAL OR SCRIPT BOX TOOLS
string.translation: CREA UN SCRIPT AMB EL TERMINAL O L’EINA DE CAPSA DE SCRIPT

string.explanation: Commodore 64-style script editor. Char limit is soft, but the longer this is, the more often users" script names run offscreen. Consider SCRIPT: instead

string.english: Left click to place warp destination
string.explanation: warp token: small teleporter with entrance and destination
These keys can be used to switch between tools
editor tool. You restart at the last checkpoint after death
editor tool. Platform that disappears when you step on it (disappearing platform, crumbling platform)
editor tool. Gravity line, which flips your gravity when touching it
editor tool. Freely typed text, consider just Text
editor tool. Computer which can be activated by the player to run a script
editor tool. Invisible box that runs a script when touched
editor tool. Small teleporter with entrance and destination
editor tool. Makes a room edge be connected to its opposite edge
editor tool. Crewmate that can be rescued
editor, indicates both SPACE key and SHIFT key open up menus. ^ is rendered as up arrow
editor shortcut, switch to different tileset
editor shortcut, switch to different tileset color/variant
editor shortcut, invisible box which enemies always stay inside of
editor shortcut, invisible box which platforms always stay inside of
editor shortcut, reload tilesets, sprites, music, etc
editor shortcut, direct mode is manual tile placing mode, where walls are not automatically made nice
editor shortcut, dir=direction, change which edges of the room wrap around. Can be horizontal, vertical or all sides
editor shortcut, the name of the room appears at the bottom
level editor, save level, `Map` is basically redundant
level editor, load level, `Map` is basically redundant

string.english: Enter map filename to save as:
string.translation: Introdueix el nom de fitxer del mapa on es desarà:
string.explanation: level editor text input, save level file as

string.translation: Introdueix el nom de fitxer del mapa que s’obrirà:
string.explanation: level editor text input, load level file

string.translation: Introdueix un nou nom de sala:
string.explanation: level editor text input, the name of the room appears at the bottom

string.translation: Introdueix les coordenades de la sala (x,y):
string.explanation: level editor text input, go to another room by its coordinates, for example, 9,15
level editor text input, enter name of newly created script, or edit the script name of a terminal/script box

string.translation: Introdueix el text de la sala:
string.explanation: level editor text input, enter text to place in the room
editor tileset name, Now using Space Station Tileset
editor tileset name, Now using Outside Tileset
editor tileset name, Now using Lab Tileset
editor tileset name, Now using Warp Zone Tileset. The Warp Zone got its name because its rooms wrap around, but think Star Trek
editor tileset name, Now using Ship Tileset. Spaceship

string.translation: Ara es fa servir el conjunt de peces {area}
string.explanation: level editor, user changed the tileset of the room to {area} (like Ship, Lab, etc)

string.translation: S’ha canviat el color|del conjunt de peces
string.explanation: level editor, user changed the tileset colour/variant of the room
level editor, user changed enemy appearance for the room
level editor, reloaded graphics assets/resources, music and sound effects
user was supposed to enter something like `12,12`, but entered `as@df`

string.translation: ERROR: No s’ha pogut obrir el nivell
string.explanation: that level could not be loaded, maybe it does not exist

string.translation: ERROR: No s’ha pogut desar el nivell!
string.explanation: maybe the filename is too long? exclamation mark because you will lose your data if you quit

string.translation: La mida del mapa ara és [{width},{height}]
string.explanation: editor, the map is now {width} by {height}
editor, manual tile placing mode where walls are not automatically made nice, now changed to automatic mode
editor, manual tile placing mode where walls are not automatically made nice, now changed to manual mode

string.english: ERROR: Warp lines must be on edges
string.translation: ERROR: Les línies cícliques han de ser a les vores
string.explanation: level editor, warp lines make a room edge be connected to its opposite edge. So they must be placed on one of the edges, not in the middle

string.translation: La sala és cíclica en totes direccions
string.explanation: level editor, all edges of the room are connected with each other. If the player leaves the room they end up on the other side of the same room.
level editor, the left and right edges of the room are connected with each other. The player can still go to other rooms on the top and bottom
level editor, the top and bottom edges of the room are connected with each other. The player can still go to other rooms on the left and right
level editor, no edges are connected and the player can go to other rooms

string.english: ERROR: No checkpoint to spawn at
string.translation: ERROR: No hi ha cap punt de control|on aparèixer
string.explanation: we cannot playtest because there is no checkpoint in this room that the player could start (be spawned) at

string.english: ERROR: Max number of trinkets is 100
string.translation: ERROR: El nombre màxim de lluentons|és 100
string.explanation: editor, user tried to place another trinket

string.english: ERROR: Max number of crewmates is 100
string.translation: ERROR: El nombre màxim de tripulants|és 100
string.explanation: editor, user tried to place another crewmate
editor message, credits would have been shown but weren't
appended to time format for 99/100 seconds (example: 1:15.99). Time trial results
Might be tight, the exclamation mark may be removed
Might be tight, the exclamation mark may be removed

string.english: You have rescued a crew member!
string.translation: Has rescatat un membre de la tripulació!
string.explanation: If you need to manually wordwrap: please ensure this has exactly two lines. Ignore the (font-adapted) maximum if it says 1 line.

string.english: Press arrow keys or WASD to move
string.translation: Prem les tecles de fletxa o WASD per a moure’t

string.english: Press ENTER to view map and quicksave
string.translation: Prem Retorn per a veure el mapa|i desar ràpidament

string.english: Press {button} to view map and quicksave
If you prefer, you can press UP or DOWN instead of ACTION to flip.
string.translation: Si ho prefereixes, pots prémer ↑ o ↓ en lloc d’Acció per a invertir-te.

string.english: Help! Can anyone hear this message?
Verdigris? Are you out there? Are you ok?
string.translation: Verdet? Ets allà fora? Estàs bé?

string.english: Please help us! We've crashed and need assistance!
string.translation: Ajudeu-nos! Ens hem estavellat i necessitem ajuda!

string.english: This is Doctor Violet from the D.S.S. Souleye! Please respond!
string.translation: Aquí la doctora Violeta de la DSS Souleye! Responeu, si us plau!
Si us plau... Que algú respongui...

string.english:
Congratulations!
You have found a shiny trinket!
string.translation:
Enhorabona!
Has trobat un lluentó brillant!

string.english:
Congratulations!
You have found a lost crewmate!
string.translation:
Enhorabona!
Has trobat un tripulant perdut!

string.english:
Congratulations!
You have found the secret lab!
string.translation:
Enhorabona!
Has trobat el laboratori secret!

string.english: The secret lab is separate from the rest of the game. You can now come back here at any time by selecting the new SECRET LAB option in the play menu.
string.translation: El laboratori secret està separat|de la resta del joc. Pots tornar-hi|en qualsevol moment seleccionant|la nova opció LABORATORI SECRET|al menú del joc.

string.explanation: crewmate name as menu option: Who do you want to play the level with?
crewmate name as menu option: Who do you want to play the level with?
crewmate name as menu option: Who do you want to play the level with?
crewmate name as menu option: Who do you want to play the level with?
credits roll. Starring the following 6 crew members
credits roll. Starring the following 6 crew members
credits roll. Starring the following 6 crew members
credits roll. Starring the following 6 crew members
credits roll. Starring the following 6 crew members
credits roll. Starring the following 6 crew members
credits roll. Starring the following 6 crew members

string.english: When you're standing on the floor, Vitellary will try to walk to you.
string.translation: Quan siguis a terra, en Vitel·lí mirarà de caminar cap a tu.

string.english: When you're standing on the floor, Vermilion will try to walk to you.
string.translation: Quan siguis a terra, en Vermelló mirarà de caminar cap a tu.

string.english: When you're standing on the floor, Verdigris will try to walk to you.
string.translation: Quan siguis a terra, en Verdet mirarà de caminar cap a tu.

string.english: When you're standing on the floor, Victoria will try to walk to you.
string.translation: Quan siguis a terra, la Victòria mirarà de caminar cap a tu.

string.english: When you're standing on the floor, your companion will try to walk to you.
string.translation: Quan siguis a terra, l’acompanyant mirarà de caminar cap a tu.
string.explanation: Intermission 1, unknown companion, normally impossible but reproducible in custom levels

string.english: When you're standing on the ceiling, Vitellary will try to walk to you.
string.translation: Quan siguis al sostre, en Vitel·lí mirarà de caminar cap a tu.

string.english: When you're standing on the ceiling, Vermilion will try to walk to you.
string.translation: Quan siguis al sostre, en Vermelló mirarà de caminar cap a tu.

string.english: When you're standing on the ceiling, Verdigris will try to walk to you.
string.translation: Quan siguis al sostre, en Verdet mirarà de caminar cap a tu.

string.english: When you're standing on the ceiling, Victoria will try to walk to you.
string.translation: Quan siguis al sostre, la Victòria mirarà de caminar cap a tu.

string.english: When you're standing on the ceiling, your companion will try to walk to you.
string.translation: Quan siguis al sostre, l’acompanyant mirarà de caminar cap a tu.
string.explanation: Intermission 1 in flip mode, unknown companion, normally impossible but reproducible in custom levels

string.english: When you're NOT standing on the floor, Vitellary will stop and wait for you.
string.translation: Quan NO siguis a terra, en Vitel·lí s’aturarà i t’esperarà.

string.english: When you're NOT standing on the floor, Vermilion will stop and wait for you.
string.translation: Quan NO siguis a terra, en Vermelló s’aturarà i t’esperarà.

string.english: When you're NOT standing on the floor, Verdigris will stop and wait for you.
string.translation: Quan NO siguis a terra, en Verdet s’aturarà i t’esperarà.

string.english: When you're NOT standing on the floor, Victoria will stop and wait for you.
string.translation: Quan NO siguis a terra, la Victòria s’aturarà i t’esperarà.

string.english: When you're NOT standing on the floor, your companion will stop and wait for you.
string.translation: Quan NO siguis a terra, l’acompanyant s’aturarà i t’esperarà.
string.explanation: Intermission 1, unknown companion, normally impossible but reproducible in custom levels

string.english: When you're NOT standing on the ceiling, Vitellary will stop and wait for you.
string.translation: Quan NO siguis al sostre, en Vitel·lí s’aturarà i t’esperarà.

string.english: When you're NOT standing on the ceiling, Vermilion will stop and wait for you.
string.translation: Quan NO siguis al sostre, en Vermelló s’aturarà i t’esperarà.

string.english: When you're NOT standing on the ceiling, Verdigris will stop and wait for you.
string.translation: Quan NO siguis al sostre, en Verdet s’aturarà i t’esperarà.

string.english: When you're NOT standing on the ceiling, Victoria will stop and wait for you.
string.translation: Quan NO siguis al sostre, la Victòria s’aturarà i t’esperarà.

string.english: When you're NOT standing on the ceiling, your companion will stop and wait for you.
string.translation: Quan NO siguis al sostre, l’acompanyant s’aturarà i t’esperarà.
string.explanation: Intermission 1 in flip mode, unknown companion, normally impossible but reproducible in custom levels

string.english: You can't continue to the next room until he is safely across.
string.translation: No pots anar a la següent sala fins que no pugui travessar de manera segura.

string.english: You can't continue to the next room until she is safely across.
string.translation: No pots anar a la següent sala fins que no pugui travessar de manera segura.

string.english: You can't continue to the next room until they are safely across.
string.translation: No pots anar a la següent sala fins que no pugui travessar de manera segura.
string.explanation: Intermission 1, unknown companion, normally impossible but reproducible in custom levels

achievement/trophy title - V rank in time trial
achievement/trophy title - V rank in time trial

string.english: Obtain a V Rank in this Time Trial
string.translation: Obtén un rang V en aquesta contrarellotge

string.english: Complete the game in flip mode
string.translation: Passa’t el joc en el mode invertit

string.english: Last 5 seconds on the Super Gravitron
Last 10 seconds on the Super Gravitron
Last 15 seconds on the Super Gravitron
Last 20 seconds on the Super Gravitron
Last 30 seconds on the Super Gravitron
Last 1 minute on the Super Gravitron

string.explanation: achievement/trophy title - no death mode complete

string.english: Complete the game in no death mode
string.translation: Passa’t el joc en el mode|sense cap mort

string.english: Could not mount {path}: real directory doesn't exist
string.translation: No s’ha pogut muntar {path}: el directori real no existeix
string.explanation: mount: link/attach a directory (folder) in the filesystem into the game's filesystem so we can access it

string.english: ERROR: Could not write to language folder! Make sure there is no "lang" folder next to the regular saves.
string.translation: ERROR: No s’ha pogut escriure|a la carpeta de llengua! Assegura’t|que no hi hagi cap carpeta «lang»|al costat de les partides desades normals.
